title: (x) Hostess logo - hand lettered (similar to Eckmann) {Nick Cotrell (Tiff)}
content:
Hi,

I am looking for the font of the Hostess-Logo. It looks somehow ... »Hot-Seventies«. Does anybody know this font? Thank you in advance!

Oliver

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808150253im_/http:/typophile.com/files/hostess.jpg)

 [‹ (x) "Introducing" book serif face - Dolly {Mathieu Christe}](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808150253/http:/typophile.com/node/19274 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) "Racing" energetic script - hand lettered {Jonathan M} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808150253/http:/typophile.com/node/19270 "Go to next forum topic")
author: olvradam

comments.content:
Hi istitch,

is there somethig similar in the market??
Reminds me of Eckmann, but it isn’t a match.

\> Reminds me of Eckmann, but it isn’t a match.

Only in that a font won’t match a hand-painted window.

sorry, i was away from my computer…

i think Dan/Tiff’s suggestion is a good match. i still think it’s hand painted because each “s” looks different.

———
Thank you guys for your suggestions!
